name: Develop Recommendations and Cost Estimate
description: The procedure involves analyzing audit findings, developing recommendations, and estimating implementation costs.

steps.name: Analyze Audit Findings
steps.description: Evaluate the audit results to identify key areas for improvement.

steps.name: Develop Recommendations
steps.description: Propose energy-saving measures and improvements based on audit findings.

steps.name: Estimate Implementation Costs
steps.description: Determine the estimated costs of implementing the recommended measures.
